translations.english_hilali_khan: And We have sent you (O Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم): not but as a mercy for the ‘Âlamîn (mankind, jinn and all that exists).
translations.english_rwwad: We have not sent you [O Prophet] except as a mercy to the worlds.

arabic_text: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ
phonetic: 21.108 Qul 'Innamā Yūĥá 'Ilayya 'Annamā 'Ilahukum 'Ilahun Wāĥidun Fahal 'Antum Muslimūna

translations.english_saheeh: Say, "It is only revealed to me that your god is but one God; so will you be Muslims [in submission to Him]?"
translations.english_hilali_khan: Say (O Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم): "It is revealed to me that your Ilâh (God) is only one Ilâh (God - Allâh). Will you then submit to His Will (become Muslims and stop worshipping others besides Allâh)?"
translations.english_rwwad: Say, “It is only revealed to me that your God is only One God; will you then submit to Him?

arabic_text: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَقُلۡ ءَاذَنتُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٖۖ وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٌ أَم بَعِيدٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ
phonetic: 21.109 Fa'in Tawallaw Faqul 'Ādhantukum `Alá Sawā'in Wa 'In 'Adrī 'Aqarībun 'Am Ba`īdun Mā Tū`adūna

footnotes.english_saheeh: [911]- The Prophet (ﷺ) made this message known to all people, not concealing any of it from anyone or preferring any group over another.

translations.english_saheeh: But if they turn away, then say, "I have announced to [all of] you equally.[911] And I know not whether near or far is that which you are promised.
translations.english_hilali_khan: But if they (disbelievers, idolaters, Jews, Christians, polytheists) turn away (from Islâmic Monotheism) say (to them O Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم): "I give you a notice (of war as) to be known to us all alike. And I know not whether that which you are promised (i.e. the torment or the Day of Resurrection) is near or far.[1]"
translations.english_rwwad: But if they turn away, say, “I have proclaimed the message to you all alike, and I do not know whether what you are warned of is near or far.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡتُمُونَ
phonetic: 21.110 'Innahu Ya`lamu Al-Jahra Mina Al-Qawli Wa Ya`lamu Mā Taktumūna

translations.english_saheeh: Indeed, He knows what is declared of speech, and He knows what you conceal.
translations.english_hilali_khan: (Say O Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم): Verily, He (Allâh) knows that which is spoken aloud (openly) and that which you conceal.
translations.english_rwwad: Indeed, He knows what is said openly and knows what you conceal.

arabic_text: وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِي لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتۡنَةٞ لَّكُمۡ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ
phonetic: 21.111 Wa 'In 'Adrī La`allahu Fitnatun Lakum Wa Matā`un 'Ilá Ĥīnin

footnotes.english_saheeh: [912]- The postponement of punishment.

translations.english_saheeh: And I know not; perhaps it[912] is a trial for you and enjoyment for a time."
translations.english_hilali_khan: And I know not, perhaps it may be a trial for you, and an enjoyment for a while.
translations.english_rwwad: I do not know; perhaps this [delay] is a test for you and an enjoyment for a while.”

arabic_text: قَٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
phonetic: 21.112 Qāla Rabbi Aĥkum Bil-Ĥaqqi Wa Rabbunā Ar-Raĥmānu Al-Musta`ānu `Alá Mā Taşifūna

footnotes.english_saheeh: [913]- i.e., their lies and disbelief.

translations.english_saheeh: [The Prophet (ﷺ)] has said, "My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe."[913]
translations.english_hilali_khan: He (Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم) said: "My Lord! Judge You in truth! Our Lord is the Most Gracious, Whose Help is to be sought against that which you attribute (unto Allâh that He has offspring, and unto Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم that he is a sorcerer, and unto the Qur’ân that it is poetry)!"
translations.english_rwwad: [The Prophet] said, “My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. Our Lord is the Most Compassionate Whose help is to be sought against what you describe.”
